text: Senario outline: introduce players to game. Game should be contextualize as an interactive exploration tool. Explain the probe's abilities being very different from real life, and the solar system being different as well. Then explain that the first mission will be to visit psyche.
Intro: Hello, and welcome to <game name here>, an interactive exploration of the solar system! For decades, scientists all around the world have been using technology to visit and few planets and asteroids in our solar system.
